new: New price Queue system. NuPrice will now check your new price against Amazon. Until Amazon reflects price change. NuPrice will also retry price change afer X minutes until it sees new price.
You may turn off the queue notifcation box via the settings page.
fixes: Fixed with filters being deleted messing up auto fill logic.
Fixed issue with amazon merchant type not found on certain pages.
Fixed issue where obscure title could mess up array from amazon.
Made better fitting table and scroll bar.
Fixed issue where draw system would not correctly send next number. Causing page to hang on loading page.
Fix issue with searching system.  Would not always grab filters and cause issues.
